<<<<<<< HEAD
Thirteen sermons upon several useful subjects two of them being funeral dicourses, occasioned by the death of the Reverend Mr. Nathaniel Mitchel, Minister of the Gospel ... / by John Collinges ... Sermons. Selections Collinges, John, 1623-1690.
[6], 261, [2] p.
Printed by T.S. for Edward Giles ..., London : 1684.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library. Advertisement: [2] p. at end. I. The crown of righteousness ... -- II. The influence of God upon getting wealth -- III. The small influence that abundance hath ... -- IV. The nature of that testimony, which Christians are bound to give ... -- V. The nature of persecution for righteousness sake ... -- VI. The riddle of a persecuted believers life -- VII. How persecutions turneth to believers ...
=======

Printed by T.S. for Edward Giles ..., London : 1684.
